faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Sora2
faq.description: Need more details? Reach out by email or explore our documentation.

items.title: What resolutions does Sora2 support?
items.description: Sora2 renders up to 1080p. Choose the resolution and aspect ratio that fits your workflow.

items.title: Can I combine text prompts with reference images?
items.description: Yes. Upload reference frames or mood boards and Sora2 will align the motion, lighting, and style to your assets.

items.title: How are my assets handled?
items.description: Uploaded files and generated clips are stored securely, encrypted at rest, and automatically deleted after delivery unless you opt-in to save them.

items.title: Do you offer commercial usage rights?
items.description: All paid plans include full commercial usage. Contact us for enterprise agreements or dedicated capacity.
